com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.platform.security

Class SCUIDirectAccessValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.platform.security.SCUIDirectAccessValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISCUISessionAware, ISCUIRequestValidator

    public class SCUIDirectAccessValidator
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISCUIRequestValidator
    This validator should be used to restrict direct access to directories/files which contains configuration data.
    URIs which should be restricted should be provided via context parameters.
    Any indirect access (eg. via request dispatcher from already allowed URI) to these URIs will be allowed.
    The validator works in two modes -
    • ON - Set this mode to turn on the validator. (This is default mode).
    • OFF - Set this mode to turn off the validator.
    These Modes can be set using context parameter SCUIImplConstants#DIRECT_ACCESS_VALIDATOR_MODE. The validtor determines URI patterns for whom direct access should not be allowed by reading context parameters. These patterns can be registered via context parameters starting with any of these names -
    • directaccess.restricted.uri - any URI starting with the value will be restricted.
    • directaccess.restricted.uri.endswith - any URI ending with the value will be restricted.
    • directaccess.restricted.uri.regex - any URI matching the regular expression provided in value would be restricted.
    Note: All the values provided should not consider context path in URI. asmishra
